full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 467 Filed 11/15/21 Page 145 of 158 145 LBAAMAX5ps Rocchio - Cross 1 Honor, part of my point. 2 THE COURT: If the point is that she doesn't know any of the facts of the specific case and the government concedes that's true, we can move on. 3 MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes. 4 I guess the other point, your Honor, which I can develop, is, these studies that are included and impact the statistics are really not relevant here because they deal with males or a combination of males and females, and there are only a few of them that deal with females specifically. 5 THE COURT: OK. 6 MR. PAGLIUCA: So when we're conflating these things, it conflates the numbers. 7 May I proceed, your Honor? 8 THE COURT: You may. 9 MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you. 10 Q. So that the first study, which is in 2016, in the last column, is all males. Do you see that? 11 A. Could you -- the page is upside down on my screen. Can we rotate it so that I can look at what you're seeing, please. 12 MR. PAGLIUCA: I don't know if Ms. Drescher can do that or not. 13 THE WITNESS: Or I can look at a paper copy. But I -- there's no way I can read that. 14 THE COURT: I can't read it either. 15 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00007324
